cast.overview: Based on the journals of Che Guevara, leader of the Cuban Revolution. In his memoirs, Guevara recounts adventures he and best friend Alberto Granado had while crossing South America by motorcycle in the early 1950s.
cast.title: The Motorcycle Diaries

details.biography:
Gabriela Aguilera Vallejos (Santiago, August 12, 1975) is a Chilean actress and singer. Part of the Pink Milk musical trio, which seeks to relieve the feminine image of the 1940.

She is a licensed actress at the Catholic University in 1999, and then has taught teaching and acting in various institutions of higher education in Chile. He has also developed a vocal work in various artistic edges, through his participation in his musical group2 and interpreting part of the soundtrack of the film Violeta se a los cielos.

Among his artistic performances, the theatrical work Las cosas que nunca tengo that pays a tribute to Gabriela Mistral is told. It also highlights the participation, along with his choral group, at the Teatro del Lago, in Frutillar, during the 2012-2013 season.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
details.name: Gabriela Aguilera
